MetadataAttributes.label: DOI
MetadataAttributes.description: A DOI is a Digital Object Identifier and contains a persistent, resolvable identifier for a document.

MetadataAttributes.label: ISBN
MetadataAttributes.description: Please provide a valid ISBN for this document.

MetadataAttributes.label: ISSN
MetadataAttributes.description: A ISSN is a unique identifier for grey literature and easily provides a reference to journals, etc.

MetadataAttributes.label: Issue
MetadataAttributes.description: Please provide the issue number or a special issue title.

MetadataAttributes.label: Date of publishing
MetadataAttributes.description: Please insert the date this document has been or is going to be issued/released to the public.

MetadataAttributes.label: No. pages
MetadataAttributes.description: Provide the number of pages this document contains.

MetadataAttributes.label: First page no.
MetadataAttributes.description: Please provide the page number where to find first page of your document within the journal or other media.

MetadataAttributes.label: Publisher
MetadataAttributes.description: Useful if you want to specify the name of the publisher releasing the journal, book, etc.

MetadataAttributes.label: URL
MetadataAttributes.description: Please provide a valid URL to the location of the released document.

MetadataAttributes.label: Volume
MetadataAttributes.description: Journals and other media often are released in volumes. Please provide the volume number.
